roleset.note: Rolesets might be difficult to distinguish in the transitive. Ontology of the arg1 might be the key: only agentive entities can appear in arg1 of motivate.01, while objects and actions can appear as arg1 of motivate.02. I'm not certain if agentive entities could appear as arg1 of motivate.02, but if they did, their agentive status would be external to the act of motivation.
